enchantment.dnt.gravity.desc: Shoot arrows that pull all entities towards it
enchantment.dnt.traveler.desc: Increases running speed and allows you to run up full blocks.
enchantment.dnt.wither_coated.desc: Apply wither at the cost of more durability
enchantment.dnt.power.desc: Increases the damage of arrows and bolts fired from ranged weapons
enchantment.dnt.multishot.desc: Allows you to fire a second arrow for the price of one.
